_header: This woman that died in dolour
Subjects: translations; inscriptions; sermons, verse in; Christ, love to sinners
_description: Inscription of the tomb of a sinful woman, translating Candidus flore nitet hec extincta dolore — one couplet

Bod649.Transcription:
Þis woman þat deyde in dolooris qwytter þen þe
                    lili flour
